thread.title: Here’s How Popeye’s Chicken Will Likely Change After The Burger King Merger—Delish.com
thread.title_full: Here’s How Popeye’s Chicken Will Likely Change After The Burger King Merger—Delish.com

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Here’s How Popeye’s Chicken Will Likely Change After The Burger King Merger—Delish.com
text:
If you haven't heard by now, Burger King just bought Popeyes for $1.8 billion (NBD), and if you're wondering what that means for the future of the chicken company, you're not alone. A change is definitely gonna come, and though we don't have any definitives yet, here's a glimpse at what you can expect.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below If you're a diehard fan of the Popeyes menu, be prepared to see some changes. Though you may have your personal favorites, anything that isn't a big menu seller has the chance to get axed in this merger, according to an article from Canadian Business . Price hikes to raise revenue are also a possibility, but they will likely update the items before raising the cost, serving up a larger size or adding in new special ingredients to justify a price hike. Name changes for existing items are also in the cards to revamp and update the menu.
